contextId.information: Mary used this polite expression to say that she had not engaged in sexual activity. AT: "I am a virgin." (UDB) (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
contextId.quote: I have not slept with any man

contextId.information: "had a flow of blood." She was probably bleeding from her womb even when it was not the normal time for it. Some cultures may have a polite way of referring to this condition. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
